runScheduledEmailNotifications() - Method in class com.wilma.service.positions.ApplicationNotificationService
Scheduled to run at 5:00PM each day (MON - FRI only).
All new applications that have not been sent to the partner (where PositionApplication#isViewed() = false) are fetched, and email notifications are sent to their respective owning partners.
